title: Favela Rising - Hope in the Brazilian Ghettos
description:
This is one of the most inspiring things I&#039;ve  seen on TV for a long time and felt compelled to share it..

"Co-directed by American filmmakers Jeff Zimbalist and Matt Mochary, this Oscar-nominated documentary serves as a powerful companion piece to City Of God&#039;s account of gang warfare. Vividly shot on digital video in the streets of Rio, Favela Rising tells the inspirational story of Anderson Sa, a former drug dealer in the notorious district of Vigario Geral, who galvanized his violence-plagued community by setting up the AfroReggae music and dance movement."
